src_original: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra bhinnamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvaprativiśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇālaṃkāramabhibhavati,
vajraratnanāma ca na vijahāti,  sarvadāridyaṃ ca vinivartayati,

bodhicittanāma ca na vijahāti,  saṃsāradāridyaṃ ca vinivartayatīti //  tasmād yo 'pi pāramitāsu sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā śikṣitumasamarthaḥ,  tenāpi bodhicittamutpādanīyam /  evamupāyaparigraheṇa mahāphalatvāt /
asahaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvadā dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitum,  yāvat prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitum /
tasmāttarhi tvaṃ mahārāja evameva saṃbodhicchandaṃ śraddhāṃ prārthanāṃ praṇidhiṃ ca,
